short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your Gmail into a lead-generating machine with CertaLink!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Certalink puts your critical noCRM lead data right where you live - in Gmail

Do you spend most of your day in Gmail? Wouldn't it be great if you could turn your primary communication tool into a lead-generating machine? Well, now you can! With CertaLink, you can easily create leads from emails and keep all your critical noCRM lead data in a convenient Gmail sidebar.

Responding to prospects in real-time and in context has never been easier. CertaLink ensures that you remain focused on your leads without ever leaving Gmail. This means that you can manage your pipeline more efficiently and turn emails into revenue, all from within your inbox.

With CertaLink, you get a snapshot of where you are at while you wait in your inbox. The Gmail sidebar shows your noCRM leads associated with an email, and also highlights your next "Leads to do" and what's coming up in "Leads on standby." This allows you to be more effective and productive, without having to switch between tabs.

Say goodbye to time-consuming lead management and hello to streamlined efficiency. Try CertaLink today and start optimizing your noCRM pipeline, all from the comfort of your Gmail inbox!
